rooms.description: Spacious living area with Mediterranean style elements such as terracotta tiles and wooden accents.
Adjacent to the living room, featuring natural light from east-facing windows.
South-east facing bedroom designed for restful sleep with large windows and Vastu principles in mind.
West-facing bedroom, optimized for natural light with balcony access.
Functional guest room with north-west orientation to balance energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance on the south, ensuring proper alignment with Vastu principles.
Large window to maximize morning sunlight and enhance natural ventilation.
Window designed for cross-ventilation in Bedroom 2.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with western orientation, incorporating Vastu principles for relaxation.
Functional bedroom with natural ventilation and adequate daylight.
Additional sleeping area, designed to optimize light and energy flow.
Multipurpose room adjacent to Bedrooms for utility and storage.

openings.description: Large window on the west wall providing natural light and ventilation.
Balcony access from Bedroom 1 for private outdoor space.

rooms.description: spacious terrace offering panoramic views, equipped with seating and a small garden area.
